channel.title: Trade
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Trade" - Can we?

item.title: Re: Trade
item.content:encoded: sort of. In the village you can drop items (storehouse) to be picked up by other people. If you agree on a specific time to drop and pick up, you would "trade". However, the number of items and the ability to take perm items are the choice of the village leader. ex: you want to trade 5 Tasty Burgers for a Billy Bucket but you cn only take out 3 items a day.

item.title: Trade
item.content:encoded:
In this game, can we trade or give items to other players?
If yes then how?
